クラス Mousetrap

java.lang.Object
  Mousetrap
public class Mousetrap
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a `Mousetrap' agent. Mousetraps that live in fixed positions on a 2D lattice. Each mousetrap has N "ping-pong" balls. When "triggered" (hit by another ping-pong ball) it releases its ping-pong balls into the air, which hit other mousetraps and trigger them. Tossing ping-pong balls into the air to trigger other mousetraps is accomplished by picking "nearby" mousetraps, and arranging for them to be sent trigger messages in the "near" future.
